summary: This is a texture replacement mod that adds Dragon Writing to the Daedric sword,greatsword and dagger.
descriptionHtml:
*If u like this mod and download it...please please endorse! It not only is a way to acknowledge  my work positively but also a means by which i can derive motivation and encouragement so I can put even better mods up!! Thanks! :)*

This my 3rd mod...small as it maybe...that adds Dragon Writing to the Daedric sword,greatsword and dagger. 

The writing reads: \"Death Unto The Enemy\" in the dragon tongue...hopefully i dint get the spelling wrong :P 

It\'s subtle as compared to the other inscription mods i\'ve put up. Check them out in the links below :)

Tengwar Writing in Red

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5236

Tengwar Writing in White-Blue

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7166
author: zanazaar
